Renowned Japanese conductor Seiji Ozawa has won a Grammy...
...for the best opera recording for 2013 performance.
Ozawa conducted a Maurice Ravel piece at the Saito Kinen Festival Matsumoto in central Japan.
He released a statement calling the rehearsals and performances fruitful and enjoyable.
He also says he wants to share the joy with the performers.
Ozawa served as music director of the Boston Symphony for nearly 30 years.
